title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2E.40 - Interchange Sequence Signs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2E.40 - Interchange Sequence Signs

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 05. INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 04A Distances shown on an Interchange Sequence sign should
be: A. To the nearest quarter mile, if
less than one mile; B. To the
nearest half mile if between one mile and three miles; and
C. To the nearest whole mile, if more than
three miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2E.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
